O-Ku Charlotte celebrates authentic Asian cuisine with a regional approach with a menu that focuses on unique ingredients and sophisticated presentations. From petite plates to sushi specialties, the kitchen showcases the freshest fish from the world’s finest markets in areas such as Norway, Scotland, Hawaii and New Zealand, as well as local sustainable sources.

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Alys Beach

Hours & Location

Monday - Thursday 4 to 10 p.m.Friday - Sunday 11am to10 p.m.Winter Happy HourMonday - Thursday 4 to 6 p.m.

Follow us on
Instagram 
Modern Japanese meets new urban architecture in the heart of Alys Beach at 30A. Overlooking the town’s iconic Amphitheatre, O-Ku will welcome guests with warm hospitality and authentic Japanese cuisine. O-Ku celebrates unique ingredients, traditional techniques, and sophisticated presentations through an approachable menu featuring sushi, sashimi, and nigiri alongside savory dishes.

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
Atlanta
Slide 1 of 10 Slide 2 of 10 Slide 3 of 10 Slide 4 of 10 Slide 5 of 10 Slide 6 of 10 Slide 7 of 10 Slide 8 of 10 Slide 9 of 10 Slide 10 of 10 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
1085 Howell Mill Rd NW A3, Atlanta, GA 30318 (404) 500-2383 o-kuatlanta@theindigoroad.com Dinner Daily at 5pm 
Monday through Thursday, 5 PM – 6:30 PM
Happy Hour 
Friday through Sunday, 11 AM - 2:30 PM
Weekend Lunch Recognized by & for the best happy hours in Atlanta. Eater Discover Atlanta Instagram Facebook 
O-Ku Atlanta provides a fresh and innovative take on traditional Japanese sushi and cuisine. Led by executive chef Masatomo Hamaya, O-Ku’s menu is comprised of signature starters, contemporary Japanese entrees and seasonal traditional sushi that reflect the uniquely designed space. The West Midtown restaurant offers rare and unique dining options along with traditional sashimi and specialty rolls, sourcing seafood from the finest fish markets in Tokyo and Hawaii alongside local and seasonal ingredients.

Slide 1 of 3 Slide 2 of 3 Slide 3 of 3 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides 
Hours & Location
1274 5th Street NE, Washington, DC 20002 (202) 888-8790 
5:00 PM - 10:00 PM
Dinner Daily 
Monday throughThursday: 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM
Happy Hour Facebook Instagram 
OMOTENASHI: What sets Japanese hospitality apart

Omotenashi is the word that embodies Japanese hospitality, where every service is from the bottom of the heart – honest, no hiding, no pretending. O-Ku DC offers modern Japanese cuisine defined by the freshest ingredients from around the world and a reference for traditional technique. From sushi and sashimi specialties to contemporary robata-style dishes, we create a distinctive international experience in the Union Market neighborhood.

We look forward to welcoming you into O-Ku DC so you may experience Omotenashi firsthand.
Menu About Private Dining Gallery BIG AND BEAUTIFUL, D.C.’S NEWEST JAPANESE RESTAURANT MASTERS THE GRILL 
The 12 Best Sushi Restaurants in DC

Washington Post

DC Magazine

O-Ku Greenville brings a high-end point of precision to sushi, celebrating authentic Asian cuisine with a regional approach. Our menu focuses on new seafood and classic Japanese dishes, as well as classic and avant-garde sushi and artistic cocktails. Our kitchen showcases the freshest fish from the world’s finest markets in areas such as Norway, Scotland, Hawaii and New Zealand, as well as local sustainable sources.

For press inquiries, please contact
irmarketing@theindigoroad.com Menu About Private Dining Gallery

What’s better than O-Ku? How about O-Ku beachside? Welcome to O-Ku Jax Beach. O-Ku provides a fresh and innovative take on traditional Japanese sushi and cuisine. O-Ku’s menu is comprised of signature starters, contemporary Japanese entrees and seasonal traditional sushi that reflect the uniquely designed space. The beachside location with waterfront and rooftop dining offers traditional sashimi and specialty rolls, sourcing seafood from the finest fish markets in Tokyo and Hawaii alongside local and seasonal ingredients.
Menu About Private Dining Gallery

O-Ku Raleigh is located at The Dillon in downtown Raleigh’s vibrant Warehouse District.

O-Ku Raleigh celebrates authentic Asian cuisine with a regional approach, providing a dining experience that focuses on unique ingredients and sophisticated presentations. From petite plates to sushi specialties to contemporary robata-style dishes, O-Ku Raleigh showcases the freshest fish from the world’s finest markets in areas such as Norway, Scotland, Hawaii and New Zealand, as well as local sustainable sources.
